name: Crush Square
description:
Welcome
to Crush Square. In this game you will have to avoid the cubes that
fall on you despite the enemies. Rest assured, many bonuses will make
your job easier!

  	 In addition, the game has three modes of difficulty: 
      -Hard: Perfect for people in good shape.
      -Normal: A game mode that is... Normal.
      -Zen: Designed for the quiet, this mode will bring 			serenity and good mood. 

   In addition, the pieces that fall during the game will allow you to buy new Skins: either for their effects or for their style!
